TopicTitle: Trouble changing stages for multiple parts placed in symmetry mode.

Articles.Content: Building my lifting stages with asparagus style staging. In KSP1 you could easily pull any number of radial symmetry built parts in staging and move them to another stage, like selecting two out of four decouplers to move to another stage. I can't get KSP2 to do that, it only moves the entire group. Holding CTRL doesn't seem to do it anymore. Did the bind change and I'm just admittedly blind?

Maybe it's simply not supported?

But as a workaround, place two groups of dual symmetry parts instead of one group of quad symmetry.
